## Journals and Book Chapter

- Boda Zs., Néray B. (2015): [Inter-Ethnic Friendships and Negative Ties in Secondary School.](http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0378873315000234) *Social Networks* (43) 57-72.
<br><br>
- Lőrincz L., Néray B., Pál J. (2011): [Hungary](https://uk.sagepub.com/en-gb/eur/encyclopedia-of-social-networks/book234364). In: Barnett, G. A. (Ed.): *Encyclopedia of
Social Networks* SAGE Publications Inc.
<br><br>


## Presentations and Talks

- Boda Zs., Néray B.: *Interethnic-social ties in secondary school* - XXXV. Sunbelt Conference 2015, Brighton, UK
<br><br>
- Néray B.: *Negative Ties or the Lack of Positive Ties? Ethnic Segregation in Secondary School* – EUSN Conference 2104, Barcelona, Spain
<br><br>
- Parti K., Néray B., Schmidt A., Virág Gy.: *Cyberbullying: Shifting boundaries in
scenes and roles of offending and victimisation* – American Society of Criminology
(ASC) annual meeting 2013, Atlanta, USA
<br><br>
- Boda Zs., Néray B.: *Negative Negative Ties or the Lack of Positive Ties? Ethnic Segregation in Secondary School* – XXXIII. Sunbelt Conference 2013, Hamburg, Germany
<br><br>
- Boda Zs., Néray B., Vörös A.: *Personal attributes vs. homophily* NetSci 2011,
Poster section, Central European University, Budapest, Hungary
<br><br>
- Takács K., Makovi K.R., Boda Zs., Néray B.: *Agent Based Modeling of School
Classes*. XXX. Sunbelt Social Networks Conference 2010, Riva del Garda, Italy
<br><br>
- Makovi K.R., Néray B., Pál J.: *Being loved or being acclaimed – How does (not)
status rivalry bias performance in friendship networks?* - XXX. Sunbelt Social
Network Conference 2010, Riva del Garda, Italy
